title: Riot's game developers have 200 plus year experience(total) but cant fix their client.

embed.description: League of Legends friends list bug has plagued players since the month of December as dozens of members flooded the community boards complaining of similar problems. All of them were having issues with their friend list in-client while playing League of Legends, and the problem has been persistent for some time.

body:
Currently there is no fix. I have read many threads about this issue. The best part is this has been an issue particularly through mid December and they still haven't fixed it. You know what this means to me? Lazy game developers that just wanna make money. I mean they bashed their player base earlier when they tried telling them Wukong was lackluster and apparently they cant fix their mess ups now either. Starting to sound like that abusive parent that cant take criticism when they mess up. Good job Rito.

If Nathan Lutz reads this I'm looking at his arrogant ass. Better put that 200 years of game developer experience to use. It's looking kinda stale...

replies.body:
They simply don't care about us casual players.

Riot wont fix anything until the pros complain about it.

Because that's where the money is.
Just played one game guy goes "I have to pick ekko because my runes aren't working" 200 years btw
